mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jrtd_requit_info(user_id, order_id, requit_reason, other, update_time) VALUES(#{userId}, #{orderId}, #{requitReason}, #{other}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from jrtd_requit_info where 1 = 1
and user_id in (select id from user_info where name = #{name})
and status = #{status}
and order_id in (select id from order_info where source = #{source})
select rei.* from jrtd_requit_info rei LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ui.id = rei.user_id where rei.order_id = #{orderId} and ui.mobile = #{mobile} order by rei.add_time desc limit 1
